page.title: 05Health, Future Improvements.
page.content: In the future there will be a maternity theatre & also a swimming pool for people with paralised limbs & other muscular handicaps. There is a day centre so that people can learn to cope for themselves at home rather than stay in hospital permanently. There is also a speech therapy centre. The hospital also provides a bank a shop & a hair dressing salon. There is a playroom for the childen who are just visiting & one for childen who are patients. The hospital is the main posting centre for the area. Letters from other hospitals come here to be franked & sorted. Letters can be sent to people inside the hospital or outside.
